sentences.en: Any seemingly viable proposition will be tested by market research.
sentences.cn: 任何表面上可行的建议都要通过市场研究予以检验.

sentences.en: At a certain age, it's not viable for men to take a backward step into unskilled work.
sentences.cn: 到了一定的年龄，就不可能再退回去干不需要技能的工作。

sentences.en: British Aerospace reckon that the plane will be commercially viable if 400 can be sold.
sentences.cn: 英国航空航天公司估计这个型号的飞机如果能卖出400架，就可实现盈利。

sentences.en: Cash alone will not make Eastern Europe's banks viable.
sentences.cn: 仅靠现金不能使东欧的银行维持下去。

sentences.en: Certain autosomal translocations in the heterozygous state can be fully viable.
sentences.cn: 呈杂合子状态的某些常染色体易位完全可以生活的.
煤是一种可行的代用品.

sentences.en: Economic growth was encouraged by the creation of a viable currency.
sentences.cn: 稳定币制的建立,鼓励了经济的生长.

sentences.en: Engineers are still trying to come up with a commercially viable replacement for internal - combustion engines.
sentences.cn: 工程师在设法制造一种在商业上切实可行的发动机来取代内燃机.
已确定5个胎儿能够成活。

sentences.en: It is only their investment that makes the programme economically viable.
sentences.cn: 因为他们的投资,这个项目在经济上才得以通过.

sentences.en: Only a few forest tree species can develop viable seed from unpollinated ovules.
sentences.cn: 只有少数林木可以从未授粉的胚珠发育成有活力的种子.

sentences.en: The dye is reduced by dehydrogenase enzymes released by viable tumour cells.
sentences.cn: 染料被存活的肿瘤细胞放出的脱氢酶所还原.

sentences.en: The factory is no longer economically viable.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂在经济上已经维持不下去了。

sentences.en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentences.cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

sentences.en: This seems a bit arbitrary and limiting . There are some viable alternatives to scrollbars.
sentences.cn: 滚动条有一些变体,其中最好的一种是文档导航器.

words.tran_cn: 生存能力，发育能力；可行性
可行的；能养活的；能生育的

trans.tran_cn: 切实可行的，能养活的，能自行生产发育的，有望实现的
trans.tran_en: a viable idea, plan, or method can work successfully
